name: cairo-distribution
description: Automated APT repository for Caido packages

scripts.setup:dev-env: node -e "require('fs').existsSync('.env.local') || require('fs').writeFileSync('.env.local', '# Local development environment variables\nDEBUG=true\n')" && echo 'âœ… Development environment ready!'
scripts.setup: npm run setup:dependencies && npm run setup:dev-env
scripts.repo:clean-all: npm run repo:clean && rm -rf node_modules bun.lockb
scripts.test:all: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test
scripts.deploy: echo 'This command is intended for CI/CD. It runs all checks and then triggers the repository update. For manual deployment, first run "npm run repo:update" and then push to the main branch.' && npm run deploy:check && npm run repo:update
scripts.maint:sync-upstream: git remote add upstream https://github.com/caido/distribution.git 2>/dev/null || true && git fetch upstream && git checkout main && git merge upstream/main && echo 'Upstream sync complete!'
scripts.status: echo "Git Branch: $(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'N/A')" && echo "Uncommitted changes: $(git status --porcelain | wc -l | xargs)" && echo "Last Commit: $(git log -1 --format='%h - %s (%cr)' 2>/dev/null || echo 'N/A')"
scripts.info: echo 'Project: Caido APT Repository' && echo 'See README.md and DEPLOYMENT.md for detailed information.'
scripts.ci:build: bun run ci:test && npm run repo:update

author: ebauger
